item.title: SMX Stock Surged Over 220% Today – What Is Its Molecular Technology?
item.description: SMX unveiled molecular-level identity markers for the rare earth industry at the DMCC Precious Metals Conference in Dubai.

item.title: Nio Gets A Price Target Hike, Upgrade From Freedom Capital – Analyst Expects Revenue At ‘New Record Levels’
item.description: Freedom Capital upgraded Nio to ‘Buy’ from ‘Hold’ with a price target of $7, while Barclays hiked its price target on the stock to $4.

item.title: Goldman Sachs Reportedly Identifies Six Stocks That Are Favorites Of Mutual Funds And Hedge Funds
item.description: These stocks are present in Goldman’s “Hedge Fund VIP” list as well as its “Mutual Fund Overweight basket.”

item.title: Spot Gold Hits 2-Week Highs On Fed Rate Hopes – On Track For Fourth Straight Monthly Gain
item.description: Spot gold price has surged over 60% so far this year, gaining in nine of the last 10 months.

item.title: Entero Therapeutics Stock Jumps After Company Rebrands As GridAI Technologies Corp.
item.description: The name change follows the company’s acquisition of GRID AI Corp in October.
